resources.string: The well-known Fortune for Android: print a random, hopefully interesting, adage.
To view information about this app you need to install OI About. See http://www.openintents.org/ or the Market.
You do not seem to have the Android Market app installed. Ignoring.
The well-known Fortune, now for Android: print random, hopefully interesting, adages, quotes, sayings, aphorisms, jokes, texts, ...
Whether the chance that a cookie is displayed from a particular cookie file is equal between cookie files, irrespective of the cookie files sizes.
Enter the folder containing the cookie files
Select the cookie files to be used from the folder above (do not include .num files).
VIGYÁZAT: A kijelölt fájlok között van olyan, melyhez nem társítható .num kiterjesztésű fájl! Kattintson ide, és változtassa meg a kijelölést!
Monospace can be useful for ascii-art cookies.
Fits the cookie text on the screen. Disable to correctly view cookie texts formatted with linebreaks and ascii-art.
Time period in minutes in between widget refreshes.
Suggest a cookie at system startup.
Time period in minutes in between notifications.
A kijelölt fájlok között van olyan, melyhez nem létezik társított .num kiterjesztésű file. Megpróbálhatom létrehozni ezeket a .num kiterjesztésű fájlokat?

"No cookie files are configured. Please open the preferences and select some cookie files.
See: http://code.google.com/p/androidsfortune/wiki/Help
(This is not a fortune cookie!)"
Please wait while installing the sample cookie file...
The cookie text has been copied to the clipboard. You can now paste it elsewhere.

"Try this fortune cookie Android app I found.
Search in the Android Market for 'Android's Fortune' or open http://market.android.com/search?q=pname:net.lp.androidsfortune in your phone's browser."
"Try this fortune cookie Android app I found: Android's Fortune"
"No cookie files configured, or Android's Fortune closed due to too little free memory or reinstall. Tap to open Android's Fortune!"
A file name was not specified.
The .num file that would be created suddenly already exists.
The selected file is not a valid cookie file.
Either the cookie file does not exist or it does not have a .num file associated to it:
" Are you sure you have the SD card mounted?"
An internal error occured while reading the cookie (please report the bug):
The specified folder (above in the preferences) is not a valid directory:
A file that was previously selected is no longer found:
The entered value is invalid. Set to:
A period shorter than 60 minutes might negatively affect performance and battery life.
Whether checking for app updates is enabled or not.
Biztosan frissíteni szeretné ezt az alkalmazást az újabb verzióra?
"Don't notify me of this update again"
The URI which will be checked for app updates.
